synopsis.text: On a festive night in a quaint, rural town, a young, lonely boy named Giovanni, grappling with a difficult childhood and the absence of his father, embarks on an extraordinary journey. Along with his sole friend, Campanella, the mayor's son, they board a mystical steam train that traverses the cosmos, taking them on an adventure beyond their wildest dreams. As they journey through the stars, they encounter a myriad of enigmatic characters and explore breathtaking, haunting locales. However, as the voyage unfolds, Giovanni begins to unravel the train's true purpose, hinting at something more profound and enigmatic than initially perceived. This dreamlike odyssey blurs the lines between reality and fantasy, inviting viewers to join Giovanni and Campanella on a captivating expedition through space and time.
